title: Touch wood
creator_credit: W.J. Pearson, T.P. Deamer and Castlereagh
brief_description: Presents a 1960’s perspective of Australian Timber development: The many possibilities available in the use of timber in the construction and interior decoration of private homes. Described in a fairy tale idiom. Narrated by Roger Climpson.
